creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EXPERT GUIDANCE AT HOME
Continue your fitness and wellness journey while you stay inside, with the NTC App.

Try free workouts, including HIIT, invigorating yoga classes, bodyweight workouts you can do with minimum to no equipment and cardio that gets your heart rate pounding. Switch it up with 185+ free expertly designed workouts from our world-class Nike Master Trainers, for athletes of all levels. We also have curated workout Collections that help you get specific results, but are still flexible enough to fit into your routine.

WORKOUT COLLECTIONS TO TRY AT HOME
Discover workout Collections that are perfect for staying active at home, like:
- Big Workouts for Small Spaces
- For the Whole Family
- Boost Your Mood
- Rejuvenate with Yoga
- Best of Abs, Arms and Glutes

ANY SPACE, ANY EQUIPMENT
Challenge yourself with guided workouts you can do in your living room, bedroom or a space of any size you have available. Most workouts can be done using your body weight only, or a simple set of weights.

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club Workout Library includes:
• Body-part-focused workouts targeting your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• HIIT, Boxing, Yoga, Strength, Endurance and Mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 5–45 minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low-, Moderate- and High-Intensity workouts
• Bodyweight only, Light- and Full-Equipment workouts
• Time-based and Rep-based options

TRAINING PLANS:
Workouts You'll Love
Chase your goals, no matter what they are, with multi-week training Plans designed to get you to where you want to be. Whether you're brand new to fitness or looking for a little extra challenge, there's something to suit your sweat.

All Levels Welcome
We are all beginners at some point, and the "Start Up" Plan is perfect if you're new to a fitness journey or you've taken a long time off. With a balanced mix of strength, endurance and mobility workouts, it offers just the right amount of challenge for you to start improving your fitness.

Equipment-Free
No equipment? No problem. The "Bodyweight Only" Plan is designed to build strength and rev up your metabolism, all without you needing to touch a single piece of equipment. The workouts range from 15 to 45 minutes in length, so you can squeeze in the time to work up a good sweat no matter how busy your schedule is.

Lean and Limber
Great for all fitness levels, the 6-week "Lean Fit" Plan fires up your muscles and lungs with endurance-focused workouts that elevate your heart rate. Equipment is optional, which means no excuses.

GET PERSONALISED RECOMMENDATIONS
Discover New Workouts and Collections recommended specifically for you, under the "Workouts" tab. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
It's easy to lose focus, especially with all the distractions at home. To help you focus more on your workout and less on your phone, try NTC for Apple Watch. Easily advance to the next drill, pause or skip drills, and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories.

ALL OF YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other workouts you do into the Activity tab on NTC to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club App, your runs will be automatically recorded in your activity history.
descriptionShort: Join us and build healthy habits with NTC. Bodyweight,Yoga,HIT,Athlete workouts.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Nike World Headquarters
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Enjoy free on-demand and live workouts and programmes you can do in any room, with any equipment. Put your wellness first with expert tips on nutrition, mindset, sleep and more.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Try our new workout Collection "For the Whole Family" for fun, kid-friendly workouts you can do together and "Rejuvenate with Yoga" to help you energise, strengthen and restore.

NEW WORKOUTS
Try our new bodyweight Cardio Kick, Quick Fix Mobility and 12-minute: Arms and Abs workouts.

title: Nike Training Club—Home workouts and fitness plans

container.value:
Nike World Headquarters
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005

creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EXPERT GUIDANCE AT HOME

Continue your fitness and wellness journey while you stay inside, with the Nike Training Club app.

Try free workouts, including HIT, invigorating yoga classes, bodyweight workouts you can do with minimum to no equipment and cardio that gets your heart rate pounding. Switch it up with 185+ free expertly designed workouts from our world-class Nike Master Trainers, for athletes of all levels. We also have curated workout collections that help you get specific results, but are still flexible enough to fit into your routine.

WORKOUT COLLECTIONS TO TRY AT HOME
Discover Workout Collections that are perfect for staying active at home, like:

• Big Workouts for Small Spaces
• For the Whole Family
• Boost Your Mood
• Rejuvenate with Yoga
• Best of Abs, Arms, and Glutes

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club Workout Library includes:

• Body-part-focused workouts targeting your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• HIT, Boxing, Yoga, Strength, Endurance and Mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 5–60 minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low-, Moderate- and High-Intensity workouts
• Bodyweight only, Light- and Full-Equipment workouts
• Time-based and rep-based options

ANY SPACE, ANY EQUIPMENT
Challenge yourself with guided workouts you can do in your living room, bedroom or a space of any size you have available. Most workouts can be done using your body weight only, or a simple set of weights.

TRAINING PLANS
Workouts You'll Love
Chase your goals, no matter what they are, with multi-week training Plans designed to get you to where you want to be. Whether you're brand new to fitness or looking for a little extra challenge, there's something to suit your sweat.

GET PERSONALISED RECOMMENDATIONS
Discover new Workouts and Collections recommended specifically for you, under the "Workouts" tab. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
It's easy to lose focus, especially with all the distractions at home. To help you focus more on your workout and less on your phone, try NTC for Apple Watch. Easily advance to the next drill, pause or skip drills, and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories.

ALL OF YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other workouts you do into the Activity tab on NTC to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club App, your runs will be automatically recorded in your Activity History.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.

-----------------------------

*This update is only available in the UK*

An Exciting New App Update

This new, upgraded version of the Nike Training Club app adds 115+ new classes — in addition to the to the 100’s of workouts you already love — 9 results-oriented programs, and 200+ holistic tips on movement, nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.

TRAINER-LED PROGRAMS:
Our results-oriented programs include a prescribed series of workouts and science-based wellness guidance to improve your performance and help you build healthy habits. Each program is led by a Nike Master Trainer and designed to be flexible enough to fit into your busy life.

• Our 4 to 8 week programs offer something for everyone with options for beginners to the most seasoned athletes.
• Complement your workouts with health and wellness advice across nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.
• Choose from equipment-free programs designed for training at home or basic and full-equipment programs that are perfect for the gym.
descriptionShort: Join us and build healthy habits with NTC. Bodyweight,Yoga,HIT,Athlete workouts.

title: Nike Training Club—Home workouts and fitness plans

container.value:
Nike World Headquarters
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005

creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EXPERT GUIDANCE AT HOME

Continue your fitness and wellness journey while you stay inside, with the Nike Training Club app.

Try free workouts, including HIT, invigorating yoga classes, bodyweight workouts you can do with minimum to no equipment and cardio that gets your heart rate pounding. Switch it up with 185+ free expertly designed workouts from our world-class Nike Master Trainers, for athletes of all levels. We also have curated workout collections that help you get specific results, but are still flexible enough to fit into your routine.

WORKOUT COLLECTIONS TO TRY AT HOME
Discover Workout Collections that are perfect for staying active at home, like:

• Essential Yoga Flows for Every Day
• Big Workouts for Small Spaces
• For the Whole Family
• Boost Your Mood
• Rejuvenate with Yoga
• Best of Abs, Arms, and Glutes

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club Workout Library includes:

• Body-part-focused workouts targeting your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• HIT, Boxing, Yoga, Strength, Endurance and Mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 5–60 minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low-, Moderate- and High-Intensity workouts
• Bodyweight only, Light- and Full-Equipment workouts
• Time-based and rep-based options

ANY SPACE, ANY EQUIPMENT
Challenge yourself with guided workouts you can do in your living room, bedroom or a space of any size you have available. Most workouts can be done using your body weight only, or a simple set of weights.

TRAINING PLANS
Workouts You'll Love
Chase your goals, no matter what they are, with multi-week training Plans designed to get you to where you want to be. Whether you're brand new to fitness or looking for a little extra challenge, there's something to suit your sweat.

GET PERSONALISED RECOMMENDATIONS
Discover new Workouts and Collections recommended specifically for you, under the "Workouts" tab. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
It's easy to lose focus, especially with all the distractions at home. To help you focus more on your workout and less on your phone, try NTC for Apple Watch. Easily advance to the next drill, pause or skip drills, and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories.

ALL OF YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other workouts you do into the Activity tab on NTC to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club App, your runs will be automatically recorded in your Activity History.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.

-----------------------------

*This update is only available in the UK*

An Exciting New App Update

This new, upgraded version of the Nike Training Club app adds 115+ new classes — in addition to the to the 100’s of workouts you already love — 9 results-oriented programs, and 200+ holistic tips on movement, nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.

TRAINER-LED PROGRAMS:
Our results-oriented programs include a prescribed series of workouts and science-based wellness guidance to improve your performance and help you build healthy habits. Each program is led by a Nike Master Trainer and designed to be flexible enough to fit into your busy life.

• Our 4 to 8 week programs offer something for everyone with options for beginners to the most seasoned athletes.
• Complement your workouts with health and wellness advice across nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.
• Choose from equipment-free programs designed for training at home or basic and full-equipment programs that are perfect for the gym.
descriptionShort: Join us and build healthy habits with NTC. Bodyweight,Yoga,HIT,Athlete workouts.

Nike World Headquarters

creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EXPERT GUIDANCE AT HOME

Continue your fitness and wellness journey while you stay inside, with the Nike Training Club app.

Try free workouts, including HIT, invigorating yoga classes, bodyweight workouts you can do with minimum to no equipment and cardio that gets your heart rate pounding. Switch it up with 185+ free expertly designed workouts from our world-class Nike Master Trainers, for athletes of all levels. We also have curated workout collections that help you get specific results, but are still flexible enough to fit into your routine.

WORKOUT COLLECTIONS TO TRY AT HOME
Discover Workout Collections that are perfect for staying active at home, like:

• Essential Yoga Flows for Every Day
• Big Workouts for Small Spaces
• For the Whole Family
• Boost Your Mood
• Rejuvenate with Yoga
• Best of Abs, Arms, and Glutes

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club Workout Library includes:

• Body-part-focused workouts targeting your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• HIT, Boxing, Yoga, Strength, Endurance and Mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 5–60 minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low-, Moderate- and High-Intensity workouts
• Bodyweight only, Light- and Full-Equipment workouts
• Time-based and rep-based options

ANY SPACE, ANY EQUIPMENT
Challenge yourself with guided workouts you can do in your living room, bedroom or a space of any size you have available. Most workouts can be done using your body weight only, or a simple set of weights.

TRAINING PLANS
Workouts You'll Love
Chase your goals, no matter what they are, with multi-week training Plans designed to get you to where you want to be. Whether you're brand new to fitness or looking for a little extra challenge, there's something to suit your sweat.

GET PERSONALISED RECOMMENDATIONS
Discover new Workouts and Collections recommended specifically for you, under the "Workouts" tab. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
It's easy to lose focus, especially with all the distractions at home. To help you focus more on your workout and less on your phone, try NTC for Apple Watch. Easily advance to the next drill, pause or skip drills, and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories.

ALL OF YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other workouts you do into the Activity tab on NTC to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club App, your runs will be automatically recorded in your Activity History.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.

This new, upgraded version of the Nike Training Club app adds 115+ new classes — in addition to the to the 100’s of workouts you already love — 9 results-oriented programs, and 200+ holistic tips on movement, nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.

TRAINER-LED PROGRAMS:
Our results-oriented programs include a prescribed series of workouts and science-based wellness guidance to improve your performance and help you build healthy habits. Each program is led by a Nike Master Trainer and designed to be flexible enough to fit into your busy life.

• Our 4 to 8 week programs offer something for everyone with options for beginners to the most seasoned athletes.
• Complement your workouts with health and wellness advice across nutrition, recovery, mindset, and sleep from world-renowned experts.
• Choose from equipment-free programs designed for training at home or basic and full-equipment programs that are perfect for the gym.

title: Nike Training Club—Home workouts and fitness plans

container.value:
Nike World Headquarters
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005

creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EXPERT GUIDANCE AT HOME

Continue your fitness and wellness journey while you stay inside, with the Nike Training Club app.

Try free workouts, including HIT, invigorating yoga classes, bodyweight workouts you can do with minimum to no equipment and cardio that gets your heart rate pounding. Switch it up with 185+ free expertly designed workouts from our world-class Nike Master Trainers, for athletes of all levels. We also have curated workout collections that help you get specific results, but are still flexible enough to fit into your routine.

WORKOUT COLLECTIONS TO TRY AT HOME
Discover Workout Collections that are perfect for staying active at home, like:

• Essential Yoga Flows for Every Day
• Big Workouts for Small Spaces
• For the Whole Family
• Boost Your Mood
• Rejuvenate with Yoga
• Best of Abs, Arms, and Glutes

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS
The Nike Training Club Workout Library includes:

• Body-part-focused workouts targeting your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• HIT, Boxing, Yoga, Strength, Endurance and Mobility workouts
• Workout times ranging from 5–60 minutes
• Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Levels
• Low-, Moderate- and High-Intensity workouts
• Bodyweight only, Light- and Full-Equipment workouts
• Time-based and rep-based options

ANY SPACE, ANY EQUIPMENT
Challenge yourself with guided workouts you can do in your living room, bedroom or a space of any size you have available. Most workouts can be done using your body weight only, or a simple set of weights.

TRAINING PLANS
Workouts You'll Love
Chase your goals, no matter what they are, with multi-week training Plans designed to get you to where you want to be. Whether you're brand new to fitness or looking for a little extra challenge, there's something to suit your sweat.

GET PERSONALISED RECOMMENDATIONS
Discover new Workouts and Collections recommended specifically for you, under the "Workouts" tab. The more you train with Nike Training Club, the more personal your recommendations become.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
It's easy to lose focus, especially with all the distractions at home. To help you focus more on your workout and less on your phone, try NTC for Apple Watch. Easily advance to the next drill, pause or skip drills, and more, all while monitoring your heart rate and calories.

ALL OF YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other workouts you do into the Activity tab on NTC to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club App, your runs will be automatically recorded in your Activity History.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.

-----------------------------

title: Nike Training Club—Home workouts and fitness plans

container.value:
Nike World Headquarters
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005

creator: Nike, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Nike Training Club goes way beyond the workout. Strengthen your muscles and your mindset with free guidance from your favourite trainers, athletes and wellness experts.

Workout with a wide selection of workouts and programs*, get motivated with our Nike Trainers and gain tips for complete wellness. From home workouts to healthy recipes — strengthen both your mind and body with world-class personal trainers and wellness experts.

Easily find the perfect home workout for staying active, from low intensity to high, including:
• YOGA: Essential Yoga Flows for Every Day
• CORE & STRENGTH TRAINING: Best of Abs, Arms, and Glutes
• HOME WORKOUTS: Big Workouts for Small Spaces
• QUICK FITNESS: Done in Under 20
• ALL ATHLETES: Exercises for all levels

NTC is here to help you stay strong in more ways than one - download today.

WORKOUTS FOR ATHLETES OF ALL LEVELS 
• HIT workouts, strength training, ab and core workouts, full body workout, yoga, stretch and more - all available straight from your phone
• Home fitness apps make it easier than ever with free workouts you can do with minimal to no equipment
• Workout log and activity tracker allow you to keep a fitness diary and monitor progress
• Workout by body part: target your abs and core, arms and shoulders, and glutes and legs
• New, free workouts every week with the trainers you love, with new in-class music curated for every workout

WELLNESS & NUTRITION
• Training extends past the physical: receive guidance on general health and fitness including mindset, movement, nutrition, recovery and sleep
• Begin your wellness journey with experts, trainers and athletes
• NTC TV: healthy recipes, guided meditations and mindfulness techniques in quick, easy videos

WORKOUT LIVE & ON DEMAND
• Workout videos available for all disciplines - HIT, yoga, core, cardio and more
• Exclusive livestreams with Nike Trainers, experts and athletes for training and guidance***
• Exercise with programs led by Nike Trainers - designed to be flexible and fit into your busy life*
• Wellness Q&As, guided meditations and healthy cook-alongs can shift your mindset to mindfulness
• VOD Premiere Workouts are the movements you’ve been waiting for with special athlete and musical guests**

MOTIVATIONAL FEED
• Find everything health and fitness-focused you need, all in one place
• Latest home workouts and wellness content, from inspirational to educational
• Check out the newest items from Nike Training including tips, guidance and more

Nike Training Club - Your Holistic Training Guide.
--
ALL YOUR ACTIVITIES COUNT
Enter any other daily workouts in the Activity tab to keep an accurate account of your fitness journey. If you use the Nike Run Club app, your runs will be automatically recorded in your activity history.

Nike Training Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.


https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nike.ntc&hl=en_US&gl=US


*Programs available in the US and UK. Plans available globally.
**VOD available in the US, UK, BR, JP, CN, FR, DE, RU, IT, ES, MX and KR.
***NTC Live currently available in the US, UK and JP.
descriptionShort: Expert Tips & Home Workouts for All Levels - Nutrition, Strength, Yoga & More
